headline: Security Best Practices You Should Know

digest_items.title: Implement network segmentation
digest_items.why: Segmentation limits lateral movement in case of breach
digest_items.fix: Separate production, staging, and development networks with firewalls

digest_items.title: Verify SSL certificate validity
digest_items.why: Expired certificates break HTTPS and expose users to MITM attacks
digest_items.fix: Set up automated renewal with Let's Encrypt or monitor expiry dates

digest_items.title: Implement API authentication
digest_items.why: Unauthenticated APIs allow unauthorized access to data and functions
digest_items.fix: Use OAuth 2.0, JWT tokens, or API keys with proper validation

digest_items.title: Implement disaster recovery plan
digest_items.why: Disasters and ransomware require tested recovery procedures
digest_items.fix: Document RTO/RPO, maintain offline backups, and test recovery quarterly

digest_items.title: Review cloud storage permissions
digest_items.why: Misconfigured S3 buckets and storage accounts lead to data leaks
digest_items.fix: Ensure buckets are private and use IAM policies for access control
